testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: When I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I navigate to the System Settings page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I change the Math App engine selection to "MapleNet (Math App)"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I submit the changes to System Settings
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And The changes to System Settings were successfully saved.
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: When I navigate to the System Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: When I enter valid information for the question name as "New Question 3"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: When I choose "Math App" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I see the "Math App" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: And I assert that the Math App question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I click the question designer Save & Close button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.name: Then I see that I am on the Content Repository page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new Math App question and preview it
